item.title: GHI Star Barry Fitzgerald
item.description: On this episode of the paranormal divide Barry Fitzgerald from GHI stops in for a chat. I get the chance to ask Barry about the new full spectrum camera and the Signapore theory that has been used on the most recent episodes of GHI. Barry is also kind enough to answer a wide range of questions that where asked in the para-x chat room from the wonderful listeners. Please enjoy this episode of the Paranormal Divide with host Kurt Smith and Barry Fitzgerald from SCI-FI channels GHI.

item.title: A Wild West Nite with Ghost Chatter
item.description: On this episode of the Paranormal Divide, Jimmy and Jerell from Ghost Chatter come on the show for an hour of wild ghost stories and much more. This show has it all favorite haunted places, EVPS, personal expieriances. We also have an in depth conversation in regards to ethics in the paranormal field. Please sit back and enjoy this episode of the Paranormal Divide.

item.title: Haunt Writer Marla Brooks
item.description: Haunt Writer Marla Brooks joins us on this epsiode of the Paranormal Divide. In this show we discuss her first book Ghosts of Hollywood - The show goes on. Wether its the haunted Hollywood intersections, Hotels or even studios, Marla discusses all theses haunted places that she has included in her book. Marla also plugs her second book that is due out soon. Also in this episode is a bit about orbs, EVPS and psychics and Marlas love for the paranormal. Sit back, relax and enjoy this great episode of the Paranormal Divide.

item.title: Heidi From Heritage Paranormal and Phantom Fest
item.description: Please join host Kurt Smith and guest Heidi Brumbelow from Heritage Paranormal on this episode of the Paranormal Divide. Heidi discuss the upcoming Phantom Fest held in Abbey South Carolina. We also discuss all aspects of the paranormal field. Wether its Orbs, EVPS, Personal expieriances Heidi answers all questions rom the chat room on the Para-X website. This is a great episode, so please sit back and relax.

item.title: Adam White from New Age Paranormal Research
item.description: This episode of the Paranormal Divide has Adam White from New Age Paranormal Research. This interview has Adam go indepth into various subjects in the paranormal field. You will here about haunted places, EVPS, digital recorders, personal expieriances and many more topics. This episode is a dont miss show so please sit back and relax and enjoy this episode of the Paranormal Divide with Kurt Smith.

item.title: Waverly Hills 101 With John Amerine
item.description: Please join host Kurt Smith with special co-host Tom from KAPS Paranormal Radio interview Waverly Historian John Amerine. John has been researching Waverly for the 6 years and has obtained among things 3836 death certificates, countless newspaper articles to include copies of the Waverly Herald and mechanical drawings. We sit down and discuss Historical facts and countless legends that have been brought up through the years. At the end we do have a little segment of the Gates of Hell cemmetary as well. Please enjoy this awesome episode of the Paranormal Divide.
